name: Ashes of Oahu
detailed_description:
Ashes of Oahu is an open world, story driven shooter where you work with or against the surviving factions of a post apocalyptic Hawaii.
  • Inspired by native Hawaiian stories, traditions, and beliefs but with a unique fictional twist that brings in ghosts, raiders, and gods
  • Four distinct factions to work for...or against!
  • Over 75,000 lines create a massive and engaging narrative
  • Choices truly matter and can lead to any one of over 100 different endings!
  • Guns take on new and amazing powers thanks to the Magical Weapon Mod System
  • Play your way by unlocking 50+ skills and abilities
  • 25 sq/km of beautiful locations throughout Oahu, Hawaii
  • Craft items from Hawaiian resources you find throughout the island
about_the_game:
Ashes of Oahu is an open world, story driven shooter where you work with or against the surviving factions of a post apocalyptic Hawaii.
  • Inspired by native Hawaiian stories, traditions, and beliefs but with a unique fictional twist that brings in ghosts, raiders, and gods
  • Four distinct factions to work for...or against!
  • Over 75,000 lines create a massive and engaging narrative
  • Choices truly matter and can lead to any one of over 100 different endings!
  • Guns take on new and amazing powers thanks to the Magical Weapon Mod System
  • Play your way by unlocking 50+ skills and abilities
  • 25 sq/km of beautiful locations throughout Oahu, Hawaii
  • Craft items from Hawaiian resources you find throughout the island
short_description: An open world, post-apocalyptic RPG shooter where you tap into the power of the spirit world to liberate the Hawaiian island of Oahu from the army that occupies it.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimale :
  • Système d'exploitation et processeur 64 bits nécessaires
  • Système d'exploitation : Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processeur : Intel Core i5-2400 @ 3.1 GHz or AMD FX-6300 @ 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Mémoire vive : 8 MB de mémoire
  • Graphiques : VIDIA GeForce GTX 670 or AMD R9 270 (2GB VRAM with Shader Model 5.0 or better)
  • DirectX : Version 11
  • Espace disque : 20 GB d'espace disque disponible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommandée :
  • Système d'exploitation et processeur 64 bits nécessaires
  • Système d'exploitation : Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processeur : Intel Core i7-4770 @ 3.4 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 1600 @ 3.2 GHz or equivalent
  • Mémoire vive : 8 MB de mémoire
  • Graphiques : NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD R9 290X (4GB VRAM with Shader Model 5.0 or better)
  • DirectX : Version 11
  • Espace disque : 20 GB d'espace disque disponible
